snippet.title: Lufia: The Legend Returns intro
snippet.description:
From Wikipedia: Lufia: The Legend Returns, also known as Lufia III, Lufia III: Ruins Chaser, and Lufia: Ruins Chaser (Japanese: Estpolis Denki: Yomigaeru Densetsu) is a console role-playing game for the Game Boy Color developed by Neverland and published by Taito, Natsume, and Ubisoft in Japan, North America, and Europe respectively in 2001. It is the third game in the Lufia series and the first one to appear on a handheld gaming system.

More info http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lufia:_The_Legend_Returns

Fantastiskt intro som är på den lilla skärmen på Game Boy Color!
